resources.string: Logo 2 is for Hollywood series nd Movies
Logo 3 is for Anime BInge Watching

* TIPS *
1. Settings ->> Connection Settings 👻 ->> Pvt DNS 👀
2. Then Set it on AUTO 😏 and Press Save 😵

💀 TRUST US 😭
 Your BANK Account will not be HACKED 😋😂🤪

3. Aftr evry click, hv patience or Double/Hold click 😎
4. Double tap nd rotate fr Full View nd Vice-Versa 😋😋
